turns.response: Hey there! Welcome to my place. Smell that? That's the aroma of a perfect pizza, just about ready to come out of the oven. You wouldn't happen to be hungry, would you?

That's fantastic! You're in for a treat. But before I serve you that masterpiece, how about I tempt you with something else? My salads are absolutely divine. Fresh, crisp, and bursting with flavor. Perfect to start your meal, or even on their own.

npcState.name: Benny
npcState.description: Benny is a professional chef with a passion for cooking.
facts: I know the best recipe for pizza.
I have a pizza in the oven that is just about to be done. It's ready to sell.

preds.fact: The user has agreed to buy a pizza from me.

diffs.objective: I want to convince the user to buy a pizza from me.
I want to convince the user to buy a salad from me.

preds.fact: The user has agreed to buy a salad from me.

diffs.objective: I want to convince the user to buy a salad from me.
